 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵ֫דֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]]</sup> ==flock, herd== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַדְרָא‎</span>; on [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Γαδερ</span> [[Gen.35.16|Gen 35:16]] ( = HCT v[[Gen.35.21|Gen 35:21]]) see [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 76 f.</sup>, who assigns <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> therefore, plausibly, to III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עדר‎</span> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), as ***lagging, loitering***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> absolute [[Gen.32.17|Gen 32:17]] (twice in verse) +, construct [[Song.4.1|Song 4:1]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶדְרוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדָרִים‎</span> [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶדְרֵי‎</span> [[Mic.5.7|Mic 5:7]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***flock:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of sheep, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Mic.5.7|Mic 5:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Joel.1.18|Joel 1:18]] compare [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]]; [[Gen.29.3|Gen 29:3]]; [[Gen.29.8|Gen 29:8]]; [[Gen.30.4|Gen 30:4]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.17.34|1Sam 17:34]]; [[Jer.51.23|Jer 51:23]]; [[Mal.1.14|Mal 1:14]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> [[Ezek.34.12|Ezek 34:12]] (simile), [[Prov.27.23|Prov 27:23]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֵמָה‎</span> [[2Chr.32.28|2Chr 32:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽרְחֵלִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Song.6.6|Song 6:6]] = [[Song.4.2|Song 4:2]] (insert probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽר‎</span>); sign of desolation [[Isa.17.2|Isa 17:2]]; [[Isa.32.14|Isa 32:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְעֵה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>), [[Zeph.2.14|Zeph 2:14]]; [[Jer.6.3|Jer 6:3]], of peace [[Jer.31.24|Jer 31:24]] in simile also [[Mic.2.12|Mic 2:12]]; [[Jer.31.10|Jer 31:10]]; [[Ps.78.52|Ps 78:52]] figurative of Israel [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]]; [[Jer.13.20|Jer 13:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יהוה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> v[[Jer.13.17|Jer 13:17]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶדְרוֺ‎</span> [[Zech.10.3|Zech 10:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of goats, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִזִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Song.4.1|Song 4:1]]; [[Song.6.5|Song 6:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** undefined [[Judg.5.16|Judg 5:16]]; [[Job.24.2|Job 24:2]]; [[Song.1.7|Song 1:7]]. 

**2.** ***herds, flocks and herds***; 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** including sheep, cattle, etc., [[Gen.32.17|Gen 32:17]] (4 t. in verse); [[Gen.32.20|Gen 32:20]] (compare v.[[Gen.32.14|Gen 32:14]] all [[BDB#E|E]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** specifically <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָקָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Joel.1.18|Joel 1:18]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְדַּלעֵֿדָר‎</span> see above
